#microfrontends is what happens when a bunch of devs can't decide on which #framework to use and someone just goes "fuck it, pick whatever you want for your feature."
@dan_abramov I heard @lucamezzalira say in an interview regarding #microfrontends that at @DAZN they use several versions of React in the same app
